caption:
This photograph depicts a vast parking lot filled with hundreds of cars, illustrating a typical bustling urban setting. The picture is taken from an elevated perspective, giving a sweeping view of the cars neatly parked in countless rows, varying in color which adds a vibrant aspect to the scene. In the foreground, a road runs parallel to the parking lot, bordered by a fence, and sporting a couple of street lamps and thinly lined trees.

Above the parking area, a notable feature in the mid-ground is a structure with round, dome-like roofs, possibly indicating a storage or sporting facility. The background shows an urban skyline with several high-rise buildings that seem relatively distant but contribute to conveying the dense urban environment. The sky is portrayed with soft clouds and a bright but gently diffused light, suggesting either early morning or late afternoon.

The photograph captures a daily-life scene focusing on urban infrastructure and transportation management in a densely populated area. Overall, it portrays human organization in urban spaces, emphasizing convenience and capacity in transport facilities.
title: Rows of commuter cars outside shea stadium at flushing meadow park, Queens
